name: Smash Limit
description:
This game is a 2D shooter made for "MAX Indie Games Jam - 1" within 72 hours. 

On this game, you need to shoot all the enemies, and to get the highest score as possible. 

Controls:

Movements: A/D, Q/D or Left Arrow and Right arrow, to move left or right.
Jumping: Space-bar to jump.
Shooting: Left or Right [Ctrl] Control to shoot.

High Score:

Can you beat the game-high score? If you beat it! Write your highest score in the comment below, and I will add you here with your high-score and your name/ username. No cheating, please!

Game Current High Score: 3288 by MS ANNOTATION X

Any feedback I appreciate!
